edu.txstate.pos.storage

Class CartLocalStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.txstate.pos.storage.LocalStorage
      • edu.txstate.pos.storage.CartLocalStorage

  • public class CartLocalStorage
extends LocalStorage
    Manages the Cart table. This does not use the Cart object because the Cart object calls this object and that would be a circular compilation problem.

      • createCart

        public long createCart(User updUser,
              java.lang.String taxRate)
                throws android.database.SQLException
        Creates a cart and returns the cart ID. If there is already a Cart open in 'draft' status, that ID is returned.
        Parameters:
        updUser - the user managing the cart
        taxRate - the current tax rate
        Returns:
        the cart ID for the user, new or existing for that user
        Throws:
        android.database.SQLException
